mapper.select: select store_comment_number, store_comment_content, store_comment_date, store_number, s.member_number, member_nickname from tbl_member m join tbl_store_comment s on store_number = #{storeNumber} and m.member_number = s.member_number
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_store_comment (store_comment_content, store_comment_date, member_number, store_number) values(#{storeCommentContent}, current_timestamp, #{memberNumber}, #{storeNumber})
